dc_title_s: Plan de Tournay: Ville episcopale située sur l'Escaut; à Paris, Chez le Sr. le Rouge ingr. géographe du Roy ruë des Augustins.
dc_description_s: Shows military operations during siege of 1745. Show public and outlying buildings, city streets, fortifications, fields, marshes, etc. Relief by hachures. Text written in French. Scale measured in Toises. 1 map: hand col., dissected and mounted on linen; 49 x 58 cm, folded in slipcase 18 x 14 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
